official_title: Testing Feasibility of Motivational Interviewing for Patient-Reported Cancer Pain Goals
inclusion_criteria:
* At least 18-years of age
* Has an appointment with DFCI ambulatory palliative care service for cancer-related pain
* Can speak English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: -Diagnosis of delirium or other cognitive impairment
